card.name: Jil Warka, Time Guardian
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed, choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them.

card.name: Pixie Cocoon
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Return a creature from your mana zone to your hand. ■ After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone tapped instead of your graveyard.

card.name: Byulah, Thief of the Red Wind
card.text: ■ While you have no cards in your hand, this creature gets "speed attacker". ''(A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)''

card.name: Ragmal, Spirit Knight
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your creatures in the battle zone and put it into your mana zone. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures in the battle zone and puts it into its owner's mana zone.

card.name: Romanesk, the Dragon Wizard
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your mana zone. ■ End Step

card.name: Lionel Wind
card.text: ■ Put all non-evolution creatures in the battle zone that have power 2000 or less into their owner's shields face down.

card.name: Lost Mind Torture
card.text: ■ Your opponent reveals their hand and discards all spells from it.

card.name: Mystery Cube
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Shuffle your deck, then reveal the top card of your deck. If that cards a creature, you may put it. If it's not a creature, put it into your mana zone.

card.name: Shibakage Hitoshi
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Mana Arms 5: At the start of your turn, if you have 5 or more darkness cards in your mana zone and this creature is in your graveyard, put the top 5 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If you do, put this creature into the battle zone.

card.name: Oriotis, Control Wings
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone that costs more than the number of cards in their mana zone, your opponent puts that creature on the bottom of their deck.

card.name: Trois Charger
card.text: ■ You may put a light creature that costs 3 or less from your hand into the battle zone. ■ Charger

card.name: Cylinder, Revolution Dragon Formula
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your water creatures. ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each of your water creatures in the battle zone. ■ Revolution 2—When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 shields or less, until the start of your next turn, your opponent's creatures can't attack or block.

card.name: Dark Masters, Demon Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, look at your opponent's hand and discard up to 3 cards from it.

card.name: Tenzan, Sinister Demon Dragon
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ■ This creature attacks each turn if able. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put the top 13 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: Kaiserbarra, War Dragon Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. Then you may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 7 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

card.name: Kizamu, Forbidden V
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -2000 power until the End Step ■ When you put this creature, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle.

card.name: Chikichiki JET Circuit
card.text: ■ Each of your creatures gets "speed attacker". ■ ''(Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard.)''

card.name: Burgmaru-Kun
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. This creature and that creature battle. ■ When this creature is destroyed, draw a card.

card.name: Brain Touch
card.text: ■ Discard a card from your opponent's hand at random. ■ Draw a card.

card.name: Bolmeteus Blue Flame Dragon
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ This creature can't be blocked. ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts it into their graveyard instead.

card.name: Cyber Tune
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Draw 3 cards. Then discard 2 cards from your hand.

card.name: Queen Amaterasu
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a Non-Creature Card

card.name: Team Hamukatsu's Explosion Go!
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. :► Destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power 3000 or less. :► Choose a card in the battle zone and put it into its owner's mana zone.

card.name: Taiyaki Giant
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, untap 4 cards in your mana zone.

card.name: Boys to Men
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. ■ Draw a card. ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Stepple, Cherry Blossom Wind Faerie
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ When this creature is destroyed, put a card from your mana zone into your graveyard.

card.name: Rudolf Carnac
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Dope Double Boarder
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, untap it and double the power of this creature until the End Step ■ When this creature would be destroyed, you may destroy one of your other creatures instead.

card.name: Crystal Cave
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may take a spell from among them, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Deathmatch Beetle
card.text: ■ Guardman ■ This creature can't attack. ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone For No Cost

card.name: Bakugetto, Totsugeki Tank
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Rock Speak Speaker
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If those 3 cards have a total cost of 6 or less, put all creatures from among them into the battle zone tapped. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Taslic, Strange Stone
card.text: ■ Your opponent's spells cost 2 more to cast.

card.name: Skin, Dead Sticher
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your opponent's creatures gets -2000 power until the End Step

card.name: Bombardment Mutant
card.text: ■ When this creature is put into your graveyard from anywhere, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -2000 power until the End Step

card.name: Revival of the Lost Forbidden Spell
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Cast a spell that costs 4 or less from your graveyard For No Cost

card.name: Wakamecha, Eternal Girl
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature is put into your graveyard from anywhere, shuffle all cards in your graveyard and put it on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Hanabishi Hanako
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

card.name: Gunbutler Great Seven
card.text: ■ If you have 4 or more Jokers in the battle zone, this creature costs 5 less to summon. ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, one of your creatures gets +7000 power until the End Step ■ Your Jokers can attack your opponent on the turn you put it into the battle zone.

card.name: Shadan Q
card.text: ■ Gravity Zero ■ Whenever you are attacked by a creature, you may tap this creature to stop the attack.

card.name: Griknife, Darma
card.text: ■ Ultra Saver: Mafi Gang ''(When one of your Mafi Gang would leave the battle zone, you may destroy this creature instead.)''

card.name: Almighty Zennou
card.text: ■ Your opponent's creatures can't attack on the turn they are put into the battle zone. ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: Majigod Magna
card.text: ■ Master God Over Dynamite Spell ''(You may discard a card as you cast this spell. If you do, reduce the casting cost of this spell by 2 for each card you discarded during this turn. It can't cost 0 or less.)'' ■ Gacharange summon 3 times.

card.name: TE-10, Salvage
card.text: ■ Mana Drive 5 (Water): When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 5 or more cards in your mana zone and one or more of them is water civilization, you may return a spell or aura from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Gacharange Reminder
